text: Oxymeris maculata, common name the marlinspike auger, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Red Sea and in the Indian Ocean off Aldabra, Chagos, Madagascar, the Mascarene Basin, Mauritius and Tanzania; in the Pacific Ocean off Mexico. ==References== ==External links== Category:Terebridae Category:Gastropods described in 1758 Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Oxymeris maculata
